subject: Soccer
organizations: New York Red Bulls of M.L.S.  Reyna
lead_paragraph: Claudio Reyna, a four-time member of the United States World Cup team, has returned home to play for the New York Red Bulls of M.L.S.  Reyna talked to Jack Bell of the New York Times.
snippet: Claudio Reyna, a four-time member of the United States World Cup team, has returned home to play for the New York Red Bulls of M.L.S.  Reyna talked to Jack Bell of the New York Times.
